pullrequest.title: Add servicesim job to job DSLs.

content.raw:
I believe catkin build was not behaving properly for our use case, but make isolated did. In particular, the tests package `servicesim_test` was not being able to find the others.

It is also my understanding that the ROS buildfarm uses `catkin_make_isolated` (I haven't checked this myself).

So if we want to keep a single script, maybe we could consider using `catkin_make_isolated` on the original script?
